lexUnit.name: hem.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the edge of a piece of cloth or clothing which has been turned under and sewn.

sentence.text: Sheila became aware of the hem of her dress slowly rising .
The purveyor wiped his mouth with the dirty hem of his sleeve .
Straw boaters sat perkily on the heads of office girls , and the hems of their long skirts swirled around their ankles .
The diagonal hem of her pale-blue frock reached nearly up to her knees on one side , and her shoulders were bare , the flimsy bodice held only by narrow sequinned straps no wider than his shoelaces .
Benny reached forward and twitched the hem of Richmann 's jacket aside , so that Ace could see the Steyr in its shoulder holster .
Before the dwarf had recovered consciousness , Jotan had bound his hands tightly behind his back with a strip of material torn from the hem of his coat .
The gun hangs down below the hem of her skirt .
The dew soaked upwards from the hems of their shifts .
They saw a squirrel and ran onwards , hoping to find more , but the path petered into nothing and Victoria tore her hem on a bramble .
So I asked her why she wore those clothes ( a green cotton dress with its hem coming down , holed leggings , and uncared-for DM boots ) .
Their weight was such that the seam of his coat gaped behind his neck , his shoulders were bowed , and his front hem trailed on the ground .
There was one I craved in particular , a pink nightdress with a lace hem and a frilly neck and a family of rabbits embroidered on the chest .
She would be down there on the terrace , in her black flannel coat and skirt , clutching her plaid shawl round her shoulders , her skirt hem clogged with snow â€¦
The trouser hems flapped way above his ankles and bare feet .
The hem is left simply overstitched for self-adjustment and there is a double thickness across seat and knees .
This robe has a triple-striped band on the shoulder and a similar band running down the side under each arm : another band decorated the hem .
She opened the front door and Christabel came in , shivering with cold , the white dress muddied at its hem .
She pulled at the hem of her tailored jacket , a nervous movement that did not escape Pol 's watchful eye .
She was picking at a loose cotton in the hem of her smock .
They were almost inconspicuous beneath the hem of her satin dress , though nothing could quite disguise her limp .
Glancing at those muscular knees , ruddy beneath the hem of his pleated tunic , she made up her mind that if he ever attempted to spank her again she would scream blue murder .
Rose 's prying fingers had detected the tiny treacherous lump in the hem of her skirt .
At last he finished , gave a loud belch and wiped his greasy fingers and mouth on the hem of his ermine-lined cloak .
The garment was worn with an overdress or bed gown , bunched up the waist in front and falling behind to the hem of the petticoat .
She lifted the hem of her skirt a little , which did n't take much doing since it was practically touching the ground .
She stepped closer , raising the hem of her dress to reveal thick , white petticoats above black , polished boots .
